DataElement.preferredName: EAT-10 1 Swallowing Problem Causes Weight Loss Score 5 Point Scale
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Person's stated response about the severity of swallowing problem causing weight loss, using a 5-point Likert scale.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Eating Assessment Tool-10 Swallowing Problem Causes Weight Loss Score
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A ten question measure designed to assess swallowing difficulties.:A question about whether an individual has or had weight loss due to swallowing problems._A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ReferenceDocuments.name: PQT
ReferenceDocuments.description: My swallowing problem has caused me to lose weight.

ReferenceDocuments.name: Using PRO/HRQoL Measures
ReferenceDocuments.description: This data element is part of a full set of items that comprise a PRO/HRQoL measure. The full set must be used without any changes to the questions or value set in order to retain the validity and reliability associated with the measure. Changes may not be made to these documents. In cases where retaining the question set intact to preserve the validity and reliability are not as important as advancing the science, questions may be used individually or in combination with other measure questions.
